20 *p50743a02024*   do not write in this area  do not write in this area  do not write in this area 8  hydra is a small animal found in fresh water.    hydra can reproduce by both sexual and asexual reproduction.    asexual reproduction is through a process called budding.   the diagram below shows the process of budding. parent hydra small bud grows  from parent  the bud develops  into a new hydra the new hydra detaches  from the parent and  continues to grow   (a) the parent hydra has 30 chromosomes in each cell.     state the number of chromosomes in each cell of the new hydra. (1)  pmt
